rows.label: tev032301_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: tev032301_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Tutura about Candid & Credible's weapons.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev032301_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss

rows.label: tev032301_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Tutura about recent developments.

rows.label: tev032301_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Tutura about Candid & Credible's ground gear.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev032301_SEL0041
rows.name: Ask Tutura about recent developments.

rows.label: tev032301_SEL0051
rows.name: Ask Tutura about recent developments.

rows.label: tev032301_MSG0001
rows.name:
Are you going hunting for fish or robots or such?
Then you'll need our weapons, I imagine...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev032301_MSG0002
rows.name:
Their special lightning attacks will inflict a ton of
damage on those particular foes, okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev032301_MSG0003
rows.name:
And since you'll be facing off against the Ganglion,
you'll need that kind of of weapon to stave off their
mechanical fighters, won't you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev032301_MSG0004
rows.name:
You'll like the design too, I hope? We watched lots of
your so-called anime in order to make sure we got the
classic feel just right.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev032301_MSG0008
rows.name:
While fighting indigens, have you ever destroyed
appendages like their horns or claws?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev032301_MSG0009
rows.name:
There are certain materials you can't get your hands
on unless you destroy those parts of the indigen,
you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev032301_MSG0010
rows.name:
So if you want a shot at the rarest materials,
you should try to actively lock on to those
appendages, all right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev032301_MSG0011
rows.name:
If you do collect these materials, try using them on
your favorite gear at the AM terminal, all right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev032301_MSG0016
rows.name:
Have you been coming up against enemies that use
electrical attacks?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev032301_MSG0017
rows.name:
Well then I have just the the ticket for you...
You need one of C&C's special electric-proof suits,
don't you?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev032301_MSG0018
rows.name:
They're crafted from the same materials as our space
suits, which can nullify the electromagnetic rays of
space itself. Pretty cool, don't you think?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev032301_MSG0019
rows.name:
You could eat an entire lightning bolt and survive!
Haven't you ever wanted to eat a lightning bolt?
Folks would call you [ST:gender p1=Boltman p2=Boltwoman ] or the like...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev032301_MSG0023
rows.name:
We had to watch a ton of anime to get the look just
right, but I think you will will appreciate it?
I hope you buy one for every day of the week.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev032301_MSG0020
rows.name:
Do you really think the Zaruboggan were created by
this "Golbogga"?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev032301_MSG0021
rows.name:
Feloran told me all all about it, you see?
So where do you think Golbogga is now?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev032301_MSG0022
rows.name:
The creation of new life is a truly advanced technology,
don't you agree? So just think of the things we Ma-non
could learn from from from this Golbogga![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev032301_MSG0026
rows.name:
I hear that Golbogga looks just like a human?
Very very interesting...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev032301_MSG0027
rows.name:
This lends credence to Feloran's theory that the
Zaruboggan were created by Golbogga, does it not?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev032301_MSG0028
rows.name:
If Golbogga was human, and humans can create
things like mimeosomes, then creating a Zaruboggan
would certainly be possible, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev032301_MSG0029
rows.name:
...Hmm? How did I learn about Golbogga's true form?
A Ma-non always has his sources, doesn't he?[ST:wait ]
